title.rendered: “IDF Targets Hezbollah Terror Cells in South Lebanon: A Detailed Report on Recent Military Strikes”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF continues to attack military buildings used by the Hezbollah terror organization in South Lebanon; a terrorist cell was identified from the air entering a military building – which was attacked by a fighter jet.

An IDF drone identified today a terrorist cell entering a military building of the Hezbollah terror organization in the area of the village of Blida in South Lebanon. A short time ago, a fighter jet attacked the building in which the terrorists were identified.

In the last few hours, fighter jets attacked additional military buildings used by the Hezbollah terror organization in the areas of the villages of Rab al-Talatin, Ayta ash-Shab and Blida, and artillery fire was carried out to remove threats to several targets in South Lebanon.

Throughout the day, several rocket launches were identified towards the areas of Arab al-Aramsha, Hanita, and Har Dov, the IDF struck the sources of the fire inside Lebanese territory.

Attached is documentation on the subject: https://bit.ly/3Icp2HG
